## Summary
Describe the issue clearly.

## Affected Document
Provide path(s), for example `docs/ENGINEERING_STANDARDS.md`.

## Current Behavior
Describe what is incorrect, contradictory, or unclear.

## Expected Behavior
Describe the desired correction.

## Additional Context
Include references, examples, or related issues.
